title: Ancient
text: It‚Äôs one the archeological sites of Assam. The site is a hilly terrain where several rock-cut Shivalingas, votive stupas and the Hindu deities.Buddhist and Jain pantheon are scattered in an area of about one km. A must visit place if you like art and is inclined towards religion.

title: Good
text: Cool ambience, I liked the theme. Fusion food ... done up well. Service was great. Quality and quality both were satisfactory.

title: Marvelous
text: National Art Museum of Catalonia,is the national museum of Catalan visual art located in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. Situated on Montju√Øc hill, the museum is especially notable for its outstanding collection of romanesque church paintings, and for Catalan art and design from the late 19th and early 20th centuries, including modernisme and noucentisme. The museum is housed in the Palau Nacional, a huge, Italian-style building dating to 1929.it‚Äôs an amazing walk up the museum. No rush as no much tourists, couldn‚Äôt get inside but was able to capture amazing photos.
place: Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya - MNAC

title: Superb!!
text: If you‚Äôre in Manhattan you can‚Äôt miss to walk around Times Square. It‚Äôs one of the most visited places by tourists in NY. I like the vibe and enthusiasm. Had a great few hours. Loads of restaurants and shopping!!

title: Good place for breakfast!!
text: Good place for breakfast!! Service was fast, staff is following pandemic protocols. Portion was fantastic. Food was tasty. Decent ambience.

title: Good
text: Excellent location! Walking distance to 5th avenue and Central Park. Rooms are small but comfortable. Bathrooms are spacious. Smart TV. WiFi disconnects continuously. Staff are prompt. No room service but many restaurants around or you can oder food.

title: Quality and quantity are average
text: Quality and quantity are average and the prices are high ... closes at 18 these days... view of aircraft bay... service was good indeed.

title: Decent choices of pizza and
text: Decent choices of pizza and pasta. Good sitting area. Serves beer ... prices are okay. Pizza could be a little less salty.

title: Fantastic
text: Unmatched destination for adventure and nature lovers. From sand dunes safari to camel ride... stunning sunset and mind blowing photography.

title: üëç
text: Great staff I must say!! Rooms are modern, clean and comfortable. Perfectly located in Helsinki city center's Kamppi, with countless transport, cultural and shopping options in the immediate vicinity.lots of restaurants around. WiFi works perfect.

title: Average
text: Just standard... nothing outstanding.. the best I liked was every room has huge glass windows ..rest everything is usual. No kettle and minibar is empty. Very limited menu.. following Covid procedures. Limited staff..
place: Novotel Madrid Campo de las Naciones

title: Fancy place for lunch/dinner.
text: Fancy place for lunch/dinner. Staff is good can be more active. Food quality was okay and the portions are decent. If you get discount please inform them as you settle down .. later they don‚Äôt consider giving discount. Parking is a big hassle.

title: Great place for photography
text: The famous pearl monument and fountain is a popular spot for photos, at the Corniche promenade, in walking distance from the souq. This fountain pays homage to Qatar's history of pearling, the primary industry before oil.You can see the Doha skyline and also take a boat trip.

title: Good ambience.. with sports
text: Good ambience.. with sports playing.. quick service. Menu was limited though. Food was delicious. They practice social distancing and staff was using masks. Wasn‚Äôt much crowded as they take just house guests I suppose.

title: Good
text: Had a comfortable stay. Good to see that hotel staff are using social distancing, sanitizers are placed for customer use, their is a shield at the reception and every one is wearing mask. Room was perfect. No room service after 2200.

title: Finger licking good
text: We had dinner at Liondi which was fantastic. Great service, reasonable prices, generous portion, good ambiance and super energetic waiter. Got One complementary starter and dessert, from the chef.Highly recommended.

title: Extravagant!!!
text: The Acropolis of Athens and its monuments are universal symbols of the classical spirit and civilization and form the greatest architectural and artistic complex bequeathed by Greek Antiquity to the world. It‚Äôs one of the UNESCO world heritage. It‚Äôs ‚Ç¨20 entrance fee for foreigners.

title: Fantastic
text: Excellent lodge!! It was part of our day tour... had lunch there ... superb food and great service. Wide spread buffet of local and western cuisine. Wine was fantastic. Took the tour of the ranch which was mind blowing. It was open safari and the guide was fantastic with very good knowledge. Was able to learn some interesting facts about giraffes and other animals. One of the Must visit places.

title: Good
text: Nothing much to write as all hotels are following pandemic regulations so restaurants were closed. Room service is available though. Room are modern with standard facilities. Was good to see staff still smiling and accommodating customers needs. Shuttle to LAX is provided. WiFi works slow... disconnected many times. Coffee machine didn‚Äôt work. Room and bathroom were well cleaned and sanitized.

title: Excellent!
text: The Storehouse covers seven floors surrounding a glass atrium shaped in the form of a pint of Guinness.The ground floor introduces the beer's four ingredients (water, barley, hops and yeast), and the brewery's founder, Arthur Guinness. Other floors feature the history of Guinness advertising and include an interactive exhibit on responsible drinking. The seventh floor houses the Gravity Bar with views of Dublin and where visitors may drink a pint of Guinness included in the price of admission.

title: Sophisticated
text: Trinity is ranked 1st in Ireland. It‚Äôs situated in the centre of Ireland‚Äôs vibrant capital Dublin. Trinity‚Äôs stunning campus is home to a community of scholars from around the world. It‚Äôs open to tourists free of cost. You must visit book of Kells museum if you are in love with books.

title: Definitely one of the finest
text: Definitely one of the finest Indian restaurants in Dublin in terms of ambience. Food quantity was perfect... food authentic taste can be worked on... I liked the energy of the staff and the style of promoting products. Keep it up ...

title: Unwanted
text: It‚Äôs a traditional bar and what better than a fish and chips with beer after the cliffs trek. When we walked in we were told all tables were reserved and directed to the open space which was amazing... but soon realized that as locals started falling they were informed to take any table .. none of the tables were reserved.... that was not cool .... maybe the staff was suspicious of us being tourists... during this pandemic... what ever the reason was I felt discriminated...

title: Calming
text: Pure and calming !! You can also start a bit of cliff-walking here, true, but the great view is the thing most people head out to the Howth Summit for.

title: üëé
text: National museum is close to the royal palace. Downstairs is the galleries devoted to the ancient and medieval periods and upstairs is a display representing modern period of Maldives. Items display weaponry and religious relics engraved in Arabic and Thaana. It‚Äôs not wow but if you love history you could consider visiting. 7$ entrance fee is a bit high for it.

title: Average
text: It‚Äôs a popular swimming point and hangout place for young locals, families and children. In addition to the beach and artificial lagoon there is a volleyball court and a futsal turf pitch.It‚Äôs mostly crowded but you can always find a spot. You still have to dress up decent no bikinis and trunks allowed.

title: Fresh
text: The local market boasts of indigenous fruits and vegetables grown in the Maldives. All vendors are locals stationed at small stalls. Everything looks fresh and so colorful. It can get very crowded and cause a little discomfort as people don‚Äôt wait for their turn and come in between. But it‚Äôs an experience !!!

title: Awestruck
text: Cliffs of Moher are sea cliffs located at the southwestern edge of the Burren region in County Clare, Ireland. The beauty of the Cliffs of Moher is that they offer us a totally multi-faceted experience of Ireland‚Äôs incredible west coast ‚Äì as much a historical landmark as they are a geographical and geological wonder, conservation hotspot and area of immense natural richness and importance. Stretching for 8km along Ireland‚Äôs the west coast, the Cliffs of Moher will leave you awestruck, creating memories that will stay with you forever.

title: Heaven
text:
No words.... just peace.. and serenity
This is where I belong...
You can visit at any season, any month, any day and you‚Äôll be surprised ... Nainital has always something to surprise you.

title: Great
text: Nice ambiance, good food and decent price. Opens after 3 pm. They do have home delivery. I loved green Thai curry, can have it literally every day. Papaya salad was great. But what was not available is mango sticky rice , however they had another options. Service is good and prompt. Staff are welcoming and polite. I would recommend it if you are visiting souq as you will have to park the car in souq parking.

title: üëç
text: The most famous beach of Muscut. Mostly crowded during evenings. Finding parking can be challenging during weekends. Sunset was beautiful. Few restaurants like Starbucks and TCHE. Locals generally come for walks. Perfect location for photography as well.

title: Amazing
text: Amazing place!!Bimmah Sinkhole , is a water-filled depression, structurally a sinkhole, in the limestone of eastern Muscat Governorate in the Sultanate of Oman, very close to the Al Sharqiyah region just off the highway to Sur, few kilometers before Tiwi. Was not crowded and parking was easily available. People had come for picnic.There is small play area for children as well. The water is crystal clear and definitely a treat for swimmers. If you have that daring attitude you can also jump off the cliff.

title: Fantastic
text: Tijara fort is Around 100 kms from Delhi. Good selection of food, great ambience, amazing atmosphere and extraordinary service. They host a fantastic cultural show in the evenings. Rooms are spacious and each room has a theme and named after the person who designed it. Fort is divided into Rani mahal, Mardana mahal, Tope mahal and Deewar mahal each telling tales of their rich past. Breakfast is included in the room tariff. No alcohol served. No a-la cart menu... only buffet. You must carry your sunscreen, cap and runners. I would recommend it as a great weekend getaway.

title: Great restaurant and bar with
text: Great restaurant and bar with wide selection of drinks and food in the heart of the city. You can sit in the terrace outside and enjoy the weather or enjoy the classic cozy ambience inside. Prices are reasonable and portion is decent. Service is quick and staff is friendly.

title: Great place to hang out...
text: Great place to hang out... cozy ambience, prompt service, smiling staff, food is average, cappuccino was great just as I like strong and hot. Toilet needs some attention ( was messy). Pastries were simply delicious!!

title: Great
text: Great stay! Rooms are modern and spacious. Bed is definitely comfortable. Location is fantastic... 20 minuets to the beach.. shopping is just around the corner.. staff is great .. room service menu was limited due to covid-19 but atleast they served!!

title: Great!!
text: Had a comfortable stay at sky city Marriott. The staff is professional and prompt.Breakfast buffet was fabulous serving wide variety of food- a perfect start for the day. WiFi works good and is complementary. They have indoor pool and the gym looked great. 10 minuets from the airport and 15 minutes to train station the location is accessible. They offer shuttle service to the train station and airport.Room was comfortable with modern amenities. All in all had a great stay.

title: Good food. Great service.
text: Good food. Great service. Generous portion. Cozy ambience. Taste was average... prices are reasonable. Music could be better.... generally it‚Äôs packed so taking a reservation would be suggested.

title: Comfortable
text:
Comfortable stay! Great location just in city center with lots of restaurants around the corner. Easily accessible by metro and trams. Rooms are modern and comfortable. WiFi works well. Staff is professional. Breakfast buffet was superb!
Sauna and gym were shut due to obvious reasons...

title: Good
text: Location is great! Staff is helpful and prompt. Rooms are modern. WiFi disconnections... and does not auto connects. Bed was super comfortable it would be perfect only If the pillows were a bit soft. Room service menu is very limited however the food was great.

title: Good place for lunch!
text: Good place for lunch! Sea food was fresh. Good options in the menu and prices are decent.Service was a little slow. Food quality and quality are good. The waitress rolled her eyes when we asked to split the bill!!!

title: Great üëç
text: Great stay! Hotel staff are professional and very welcoming. Room service menu is good, prices are decent. Pool is great. Rooms are spacious and modern. WiFi works good. Just one thing... mosquitoes!!! Use repellent cream when sitting by the pool.. location is good, close to the airport and not very far from the city.

title: Average
text:
Neat,clean,spacious rooms. Bed is comfortable. Bathroom is modern. Doors are not sound proof so if any one passing by your room you can hear and at night it‚Äôs disturbing.
Room service menu is good. The lobby bar is good! Hotel staff are friendly but not professional. Can have to wait a bit to check in and out.

title: Great ambience. Food was average.
text: Great ambience. Food was average. Prices are decent. Not many options in the menu. Sangria was amazing. Staff are helpful and prompt. Service is quick.

title: Good
text: Had a comfortable stay. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Room service menu is no very elaborate but decent choices. Rooms are spacious and modern. Bed is definitely comfortable. The bar lounge is great. Got complementary WiFi which works really well. Near to train station.

title: Great ambience. Food was great
text: Great ambience. Food was great however the portions are small. Friendly and helpful staff. Sheesha is available.

title: Good comfortable stay.
text: Good hotel. Had a comfortable stay. Rooms are spacious and modern. Bed was comfortable. They have 24 hrs room service which is reasonable. Breakfast Buffet was great. Complementary WiFi was given. Staff is friendly and helpful. There is a mall just across. Location is good.

title: üëçüëç
text: Had a good short stay. Room was spacious and modern. Bed was super comfortable. Room service menu is okay. Staff is helpful and polite. Location is great. Many things to do around the hotel. Buffet breakfast was fantastic with wide spread selections.

title: A good place for Indian food.
text: A good place for Indian food. Food tasted close to being authentic. Staff was fantastic. Ambience is great. Gave us complementary starter and dessert on the occasion of Diwali I guess. Prices are inline with other fine dining restaurants. Portion is decent.I suggest they upgrade their play list though. Will definitely come back and recommend it.

title: delicious
text: Very delicious crepes and waffles and of course ice creams. Nice cozy ambience and good service. A bit overpriced though.

title: Pleasant
text: Had a pleasant stay yet again. It‚Äôs a good hotel 20 minuets from the airport and like 25 minuets from the city center. The staff is professional. Rooms are spacious. Bed and pillows are definitely comfortable. Bathroom is fine. Breakfast buffet is good with wide spread. The lounge bar and restaurant service and menu is average. Room service is available 24 hrs but they have tray charge. Over all it‚Äôs a good hotel for a short stay.

title: So-so
text: Nice hotel. Rooms are definitely modern. Bed is amazingly comfortable .Bathrooms are actually very small. Staff is okay. Room service is horrible and not 24 hrs. Just being around the airport they don‚Äôt provide any shuttle service. Breakfast buffet was below average.
place: Hotel Mercure Paris CDG Airport & Convention

title: Not worth visiting, unless Korean üòú
text: Dead mall or ghost mall... no crowd. Few brands like H&M , Nike,giordano, puma, Starbucks, few Korean restaurants and bars. Korean cosmetics like Misha are available.

title: Good
text: It‚Äôs close to airport, so best for transit. Room are spacious and modern. Bed is comfortable. Free WiFi, speed is good. Train station is just behind. Few good restaurants around the hotel. Staff is friendly and helpful. The only thing I did not like was the tray charge for room service.

title: Not so good paella
text: Had odered paella which was below average. Staff looked friendly. Cafe is good. Prices are very reasonable.

title: Average
text: Decent hotel in the heart of the city. Rooms were okay but there was this awful smell in the corridors. Air conditioner was not working in the room. Gym is very basic. Staff could be more helpful.Location is okay, close to the souq.

title: Relaxing
text: The Moroccan Bath, also known as hammam, is a traditional cleansing ritual that is immensely popular in the Middle East as a purifying treatment for the whole body. ... It has revamping, cleansing, healing and appeasing effects. Ziani is a great hammam with all old experienced ladies giving you bath. Total package is 350 DHS. You can always alter it. It starts with rubbing morrcan black soap in the sauna for about 20 minutes. Then a lady will scrub your body for approximately 15 minutes. Then comes the sea weed wrap 15 minutes followed by oil massage and polishing 20 minuets. The entire process takes around 90 minutes. The hammam left me relaxed and enhanced the blood circulation. The bath helps to get rid of impurities from the skin, such as elasticity, clarity and eliminates dead skin layers. It reduces stress, anxiety, and deep relaxation physically and emotionally.I would highly recommend Moroccan hammam.

title: Salute
text: The border crossing draws its name from Wahga village, near which the Radcliffe Line, the boundary demarcation line dividing India and Pakistan upon the Partition of British India, was drawn. The Wagah-Attari border ceremony happens at the border gate, two hours before sunset each day.The flag ceremony is conducted by the Pakistan Rangers and Indian Border Security Force (BSF).A marching ceremony, known as the "Silly Walk ceremony", is conducted each evening along with the flag ceremony.

title: Holy
text: The Gurdwara is spiritually the most significant shrine in the Sikh Religion. The Harmandir Sahib is an open boat of worship for all men and women, from all walks of life and faith.It has a square plan with four entrances and has a circumambulation path around the pool. The temple is a collection of buildings around the sanctum and the pool.Over 100,000 people visit the holy shrine daily.The Gurdwara complex has been nominated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and its application is pending on the tentative list of UNESCO.

title: Great
text: It‚Äôs a four-star hotel with 3 towers. Rooms are tastefully decorated and have magnificent views of the city. Hotel has few restaurants and bars with something to suit all tastes. Breakfast buffet, WiFi, Clothes Iron, Kettle, Hair dryer, safe and TV in the room. Amenities are modern. Buffet was average.Staff is polite and helpful.location is perfect.

title: Touristic
text:
Asper√∂ is a small island and a locality situated in G√∂teborg Municipality, V√§stra G√∂taland County, Sweden. Across from Asper√∂ the tiny island Riv√∂ is located. During the summer, there are a lot of kayak visitors coming to enjoy the nature on the island. On Asper√∂ you'll find excellent walking and jogging trails, and from the mountain Valen, you have a splendid view over the port of Gothenburg.

There is a kiosk at the quay and a small supermarket on the island. Don't miss the small museum about Asper√∂s history.take tram 11 from central station to Saltholmen and ferry to the island.

title: Good
text: Haga is a traditional area with wood buildings and cobbled streets with loads of cafes and pubs with terrace courtyards creat a bohemian vibe. Bakeries are famous for their cinnamon buns and you have to have one. A no of bistros around.

title: Overpriced
text: Overpriced for the meal portion. I left almost hungry. Ambience is excellent and service was great. Food tasted average. No wow factor.

title: Good
text: Best family restaurant in haldwani and kathgodam I would say. Ambience is cozy. Good to throw a birthday party or any small gathering. Menu selection is good and prices are reasonable. Staff is good, don‚Äôt expect 5star hospitality. They are doing a good job. Ample parking.

title: Great
text:
Best stop between haldwani to Delhi and back.
Food is great for any time of the day. Parathas are fantastic as they do it in tandoor. However the drawback is it‚Äôs only vegetarian. Neat clean spacious and comfortable restaurant. Ambience is great with Punjabi theme.

title: Divine üôèüôè
text: Batu Caves is a limestone hill that has a series of caves and cave temples. The cave is one of the most popular Tamil shrines outside India, and is dedicated to Lord Murugan. To reach the cave visitors must climb a steep flight of 272 steps. Batu Caves is easily reached by commuter train at the KC05 Batu Caves Komuter station, costing RM 2.6 for a one-way journey from KA01 KS01 KJ15 MR1 KE1 KT1 SBK15 KL Sentral. Dress up modestly; anything covering the knees is okay. You need to buy ticket to see the deity in the temple and pray, but if you are not interested to go inside the temple ( inside the cave) and have a personalized look at the deity it‚Äôs okay you can walk around in the cave and click pictures.

title: Awesome
text: Excellent stay! Professional staff, neat, clean and spacious rooms with comfortable and pillows. Amenities are modern. Location is great if you are transiting. Room service menu is elaborate and reasonable. Breakfast buffet was great with wide spread of choices, Asian and western.

title: Fantastic!
text: Fantastic! Great location,close to airport, good for short stay or transit. Staff is very friendly and welcoming and happy to assist. Tray charge for room service is very high so consider eating in the lobby restaurant which offers decent menu and meal. You do have Starbucks and a souvenir shop in the lobby. Gym was decent with modern but basic machines. Shuttle to airport is available.

title: Fresh seafood
text: If you like seafood you have to try this place. It‚Äôs neat, clean and spacious restaurant with good staff at your service. Prices are reasonable. You select your fish and how you want them to prepare it, it‚Äôs great. As the fish is sea water you can ask them to add less salt or no salt. They do great mussels, scallops and shrimps. Recommend to all seafood lovers!!

title: Fantastic
text: The stay again was fantastic as always. You guys are great doing an amazing job. Hotel is neat, clean, comfortable, spacious , modern with gym , spa , sauna , massage, swimming pool , bar , restaurant and a great team of hospitable staff at your service

title: Fantastic
text: Fantastic hotel. Great location, lots of restaurants around.Good staff. Modern amenities. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like is there is no room service available. You need to go to the hotel restaurant. There is a mini market available in the hotel lobby. Room is big and spacious and comfortable.
place: Courtyard by Marriott Budapest City Center

title: Comfortable
text: Great for transit! Inside the terminal. Rooms are small but modern. Staff is professional and helpful. Gym is just okay. Room service menu is very basic. Bed and pillows are very comfortable. Bathroom shower needs some maintenance.
place: Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel, Stockholm-Arlanda Airport

title: Excellent sight
text: Qutab Minar is a soaring, 73 m-high tower of victory, built in 1193 by Qutab-ud-din Aibak. You can get the tickets online or at the spot. Very famous amongst foreigners and locals. If you are into history it‚Äôs one of the best sight. Guides are available in English, Hindi and other foreign languages.

title: Great hospitality
text: Good hotel to stay if transiting or short stay. Hotel staff is great, very prompt and welcoming. Rooms needs little more house keeping in terms of cleanliness. Rooms are modern but little congested. Breakfast buffet is great offering wide variety for everyone‚Äôs taste. Security staff at the entrance are very humble and wishes every time you exit and enter. Reception staff are friendly and helpful too. FNB Manager is doing a great job and really interacts with all the guests. The bar in the lobby is good and reasonable. The hostess there is amazing!! Room service menu is okay but the service is quick, and they prepare the dishes as per your liking. Chicken dum biryani was yum. So over all had a comfortable stay.

title: Modern
text: Well maintained property. Rooms are big and spacious, bathroom is little compact though. Bed is comfortable. Outdoor pool, steam , sauna, gym, spa, massage all available. Lots of restaurants nearby. Room service menu choices are limited, and the prices are a little high. Staff is polite ,friendly and helpful. Restaurant and coffee shop available inside the hotel. Hotel lobby has few souvenir shops which are over priced you can get the same stuff on a much lower rate outside. All in all a good hotel to stay.

title: Amazing staff
text: Excellent hotel with amazingly friendly and helpful staff.Rooms are , spacious, neat , tidy with modern amenities. Room service menu is has decent options, prices are high though. Buffet breakfast is amazingly good with wide spread of choices.Internet was slow and kept on reconnecting. Complementary shuttle to airport every 15 minutes makes it very convenient. Gym is superb. Overall well maintained property with 5star facilities.

title: Comfortable stay
text: Neat clean and spacious rooms. Staff is friendly and professional. Complementary shuttle to the airport. WiFi keeps on disconnecting when not in use. Close to local and international restaurants. Many convenient store including Emart within 5 minuets walk.

title: Great location
text: Centrally located hotel with good restaurants around. Area is safe to walk around. Staff is good but slow... rooms are well maintained. Bed is cozy and comfortable. Room service menu is average with decent prices. Over all a good hotel however staff needs to be prompt!!

title: Great customer service
text: Nice restaurant by the beach!! Generally visited by the locals!! Staff is extremely polite and helpful. Sea food is the specialty, but you can ask for chicken and they will prepare it for you. If you are around that area I would highly suggest Taverna Argyra Akti

title: Great resort but poor staff.
text: No words to describe my experience!!! Property is good, by the beach, pool is great but the staff lacks information. They seem to understand you but they actually don‚Äôt or don‚Äôt care about it. Very small bathrooms, pillows are hard, no drinking water in the room forget about the complementary tea and coffee maker. Extremely slow service in regards to everything.. house keeping, room service, reception.... staff needs to get some energy and be professional!!
place: Ramada by Wyndham Athens Attica Riviera

title: I like it
text: Small mall with brands like mango, oasis, lasenza, body shop, inglot, aldo, milano, next, heat wave and sports factory. Mostly you can shop in peace as it‚Äôs one of the least crowded mall. After you done with shopping you can have a coffee at costa or treat yourself at chili‚Äôs. There is a movie hall, the screens are very small though. Also if you want to buy high end beauty products like channel, Dior, Burberry etc you can easily find there.Also ample parking.

title: Perfect spot
text: Great place for walks... any time of the day! Good for couples and families!! Beautiful view of sea! Parking can be tight especially during sunset. Very touristy and mostly crowded. Walking distance from souq Wakif.

title: Vegetarian
text: Good place for lunch,breakfast,dinner, snacks or just tea.Good ambience. Service is okay. Food tastes great. Quantity is average. Staff is average. Prices are reasonable. This Aryaas is all about vegetarian food.. variety of chat,dosa, parathas,thali and main meals south and North Indian style

title: Fish and chips
text: Fish and chips fan ... you have to go to Mc Donagh‚Äôs . I believe it‚Äôs the best in Galway and very reasonable. Great sitting area indoor and outdoor. Popular amongst locals and visitors.

title: Good location
text: Good hotel for a transit or short stay. Close to T3. Location is superb with many restaurants around the corner. Rooms are modern and clean but small and the washroom is extremely small. Staff is polite, prompt and professional. Room service menu is decent and very reasonable. I ordered for American breakfast and there were some goof ups.. pineapple juice instead of orange, no jam and marmalade and no fruits... as mentioned in the menu!!! so check your order before you sign the bill.

title: Amazing staff
text: Great stay! Amazing staff! Friendly and helpful and professional at the same time. Rooms are good! Big and spacious. Amenities are modern. Lunch and breakfast buffet were good for the price. Room service menu is good and reasonable. Spa is average ! Offering massage and facials. Rooftop pool is small but again modern. Had a nice comfortable stay.

title: Excellent!
text: Was good to know the process of preparing Guinness. It‚Äôs a 7 floor building. Restaurants inside. They offer free pint of Guinness at 7th floor. Guide tour is also available. Book your tickets online to avoid a long queue as it‚Äôs the most visited place by tourists.

title: Great
text: Great bar in south Dublin! Was fully packed during the day time as well. Popular spot for locals and foreigners. They have small sitting area outside which was amazing. You can spend hours sitting there sipping beer and watching people.

title: Massive
text: Displays articles related Qatars and Muslim history. Surely one time visit. Lots to learn and see about ancient rulers.

title: Good for photography
text: Katara cultural village is popular amongst visitors and locals both. Beautiful amphitheater and art gallery.They have cultural programs frequently. There are fine dining restaurants and also stalls. Good to visit any time: day or night. Is open 24 hrs.

title: Authentic
text: Best place to kill time. It‚Äôs mostly crowded by locals and tourists.Authentic Arabic cuisine and also western. It‚Äôs fun to smoke Traditional sheesha. They have animal and birds market along with spices shops. You can get beautiful souvenirs as well.

title: Great!
text: Great hotel! Stay was extremely comfortable. Staff is fantastic.. be it bell boy, receptionist, waiter, house keeping, room service... all. Very friendly and polite. Rooms are spacious and modern with all basic amenities. Room service menu is okay with reasonable prices. Breakfast buffet was just average with only selected items. Gym is okay, roof top pool is good. Hotel is very close to the airport but like 45 minuets drive to the city center... traffic is bad!! WiFi works good and parking is available.

title: Mind blowing!!
text: Best bar in Dublin. I loved the Irish music that band played! So lively and energetic.. it will definitely make you leave your seat and shake to the beats. Mostly popular amongst tourists. You cannot miss it if you in Dublin.

title: Devine!
text: Loved it!! The property is huge, even though you are far from city you have lots to do in the resort. Great food, great service, great staff. Rooms are small but bed is extremely comfortable. I had sea facing room which was fantastic. Room service menu is limited but the quantity and quality is superb. Had an excellent stay.
place: Dolce by Wyndham Athens Attica Riviera
